description: Advance Procurement NoticeSubmarine Battery Chargers, CFB Esquimalt, BC(with Security Requirements)Purpose of this Advance Procurement NoticeThis is not a bid solicitation. This is an advance notice of a potential contract with anticipated security requirements to provide interested contractors an opportunity to begin the sponsorship request process for potentially obtaining the required security clearance(s) that are anticipated. Note that there is no guarantee that this contract will proceed or that any security clearance(s) will be granted under the sponsorship process in a timely fashion or otherwise.Description of the Project and ServicesThe work includes, but is not necessarily limited to, the supply of labour, material, supervision, and equipment necessary to build three mobile, skid-based battery chargers to be delivered to three locations. Further work includes the retrofit of two existing mobile, skid-based battery chargers as well as commissioning and operator training.The Rough order of magnitude value of this contract is $13,000,000. It is anticipated this procurement will be initiated in April 2023. This is conditional on the project receiving approval to proceed by the Department of National Defence.
